comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: This is related to an existing issue so I merged ‘em together a bit. IIRC I had an initial fix for this, but I remember there being some issues with it. I’ll see what I can do.

comments.author: Dorazur.9420
comments.body: The racial skills are missing, so that charaters builds are not completely well defined with [v2/characters].
